    • exportFinancialReport

      static void exportFinancialReport(User user) throws Exception
      Exports a financial report of the user's assets to a file. Note: The method contains a redundant loop that duplicates console output. Consider refactoring to remove the duplicate loop for better efficiency.
      Parameters:
      user - the User object whose report is exported
      Throws:
      Exception - if an error occurs during file writing
